pages.text: A long time ago, The End was less desolate of a place. The End Cities were populated by actual sentient beings as opposed to the Endermen and Shulkers now. This species was known as the Enderlings.

This all changed when someone found a way to hatch a Dragon Egg. This dragon put a curse on the land, turning all Enderlings into Endermen and Shulkers. The species, effectively, went extinct after that point. Even if the dragon were slain, the curse would be irreversable.

With a certain item in hand, however, it was possible to protect yourself from the curse. I was the wielder of this item. I am the last remaining Enderling. I have stored my crystal in an End City chest, for the future hero of this world to take.
